description:
STUMBLE GUYS –  the ultimate free-to-play multiplayer party royale!
Get ready to run, jump, and stumble your way to victory in Stumble Guys, the fun free-to-play multiplayer party royale! Compete in fast-paced battles with up to 32 players and race through chaotic obstacle courses, wild elimination rounds, and insane challenges to be the last player standing!

FAST-PACED, CHAOTIC GAMEPLAY
Battle in massive 32-player online matches filled with crazy levels and hilarious physics. Explore +60 maps packed with spinning platforms, giant hammers, rolling boulders, and other wacky obstacles.

PLAY SOLO, ONLINE, OR IN SPLIT-SCREEN WITH FRIENDS!
Team up with friends online or play locally in split-screen mode. Perfect for party gaming - hilarious chaos guaranteed!

TONS OF CUSTOMIZATION & EXPRESSIVE EMOTES
Unlock and collect hundreds of skins, costumes, and emotes to show off your unique style! Become a ninja, superhero, or even a chicken, there’s a style for everyone.

CONTINUOUSLY EVOLVING GAME WITH SEASONAL UPDATES
New maps, game modes, events, and collaborations released regularly. Compete in limited-time events and ranked challenges for exclusive rewards!

LEVEL UP YOUR FUN WITH THE STUMBLE PASS
Unlock exclusive skins, emotes, and rewards as you progress through each season!

Are you ready to stumble your way to the crown? Play Stumble Guys for free now and join the chaos - solo, online, or in split-screen mode with friends!
